author: xtqqczze
body:
`markdown-link` failure:
<https://powershell.visualstudio.com/PowerShell/_build/latest?definitionId=32>

```
[+] ***/tree/master/docs/FAQ.md should work 457ms
2020-06-03T20:01:32.8918939Z       [-] https://powershell.visualstudio.com/PowerShell/_build/latest?definitionId=32 should work 60.64s
2020-06-03T20:01:32.9327050Z         RuntimeException: Failed to complete request to "https://powershell.visualstudio.com/PowerShell/_build/latest?definitionId=32". Response status code does not indicate success: 404 (Not Found).
2020-06-03T20:01:32.9335025Z         at <ScriptBlock>, /home/vsts/work/1/s/test/common/markdown/markdown-link.tests.ps1: line 119
2020-06-03T20:01:33.1943488Z  
```
<https://dev.azure.com/powershell/2972bb5c-f20c-4a60-8bd9-00ffe9987edc/_apis/build/builds/54596/logs/23>

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body:
Looks like the fix is https://powershell.visualstudio.com/PowerShell/_build/latest?definitionId=32 ->https://powershell.visualstudio.com/PowerShell/_build?definitionId=32

PR opened: #12887

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
